short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets YouTube's autoplay button to OFF always.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- It always sets autoplay to off, whether you are signed in or not.
- It overrides any manual clicking of the autoplay button (unless the extension itself is disabled, of course).
- It does not affect the playlist feature. Videos on a playlist still play in sequence.
- We recommended you allow the extension to run in incognito.
